cloudsim.ext.datacenter
Class ThrottledVmLoadBalancer

java.lang.Object
  cloudsim.ext.datacenter.VmLoadBalancer
      cloudsim.ext.datacenter.ThrottledVmLoadBalancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CloudSimEventListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ThrottledVmLoadBalancer
extends VmLoadBalancer
implements CloudSimEventListener

This class implements VmLoadBalancer as a Throttled load balancer. Each VM is allocated only one task at a time and can be allocated another task only when the current task has completed. The ThrottledVmLoadBalancer does not implement any task queueing functionality, but returns a valid VM id in the getNextAvailableVm only if available. The calling DatacenterController should implement the task queueing locally. The ThrottledVmLoadBalancer implements CloudSimEventListener to get notified of the VM's being allocated and freed up by the DatacenterController

Author:
Bhathiya Wickremasinghe

getNextAvailableVm

public int getNextAvailableVm()
Description copied from class: VmLoadBalancer
The main contract of VmLoadBalancer. All load balancers should implement this method according to their specific load balancing policy.

Specified by:
getNextAvailableVm in class VmLoadBalancer
Returns:
